com.mele.games.hex.ui

Class HexArrayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mele.games.hex.ui.HexArrayController

  • public class HexArrayController
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for synchronizing the state between the Model (HexArray) and View (HexArrayRenderer)
    Author:
    Al Mele

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HexArrayController(java.awt.Window parentWin)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearSelection()
      Marks all cells in the array as unselected.
      IHexEventListener getHexEventListener()
      Provides the registered event listener, or the default listener if there is no registered event listener.
      HexArray getModel() 
      HexArrayRenderer getView() 
      boolean isAutoscale()
      Indicates whether or not the size of the hexes will automatically be adjusted to fit the space available for the game board.
      void registerHexEventListener(IHexEventListener listener)
      Register a listener of your implementation which will receive all mouse and game events provided by the hexRender library.

      Resizes the number of hexes in the game board.
      void setAutoscale(boolean auto)
      Configure the autoscaling setting.
      void snap()
      Make the borders of the parent window fit the area into which the hex map has been drawn.

    • Method Detail

      • getModel

        public HexArray getModel()
        Returns:
        the model

      • getView

        public HexArrayRenderer getView()
        Returns:
        the view

      • resize

        public void resize(int newXSize,
                   int newYSize)
        Resizes the number of hexes in the game board. This operation retains content in hexes which exist both in the old and new size matrix. For example, in a 3x3 board that is resized to 4x4, all of the original 9 hexes would retain any type and resident information they had been set up with.
        Parameters:
        newXSize -
        newYSize -

      • isAutoscale

        public boolean isAutoscale()
        Indicates whether or not the size of the hexes will automatically be adjusted to fit the space available for the game board. Default = true
        Returns:

      • setAutoscale

        public void setAutoscale(boolean auto)
        Configure the autoscaling setting.
        Parameters:
        auto - Set to true if you would like the hex library to automatically scale the cell size to the maximum available window space. Otherwise, false.

      • clearSelection

        public void clearSelection()
        Marks all cells in the array as unselected.

      • registerHexEventListener

        public void registerHexEventListener(IHexEventListener listener)
        Register a listener of your implementation which will receive all mouse and game events provided by the hexRender library. If no listener is registered, the default listener DefaultHexListener will be used.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • getHexEventListener

        public IHexEventListener getHexEventListener()
        Provides the registered event listener, or the default listener if there is no registered event listener.
        Returns:

      • snap

        public void snap()
        Make the borders of the parent window fit the area into which the hex map has been drawn.
